snippet: A 44-year veteran of the force was also the department’s highest-ranking Hispanic.
abstract: New York Police Department's second-highest-ranking official, Rafael Pineiro, is retiring from force; 44-year veteran and department's highest ranking Hispanic, Pineiro was considered top candidate for police commissioner before Mayor Bill de Blasio named William J Bratton.
lead_paragraph: A 44-year veteran of the force was also the department’s highest-ranking Hispanic.

headline.main: Rafael Pineiro, First Deputy Police Commissioner, to Retire
headline.print_headline: No. 2 Official in Police Department to Retire
